name: Dream Inducer
description:
You have received an old floppy containing a program that can supposedly force you to have lucid dreams. Explore different areas of this dream world and find messages other dreamers left. Stay alert and try to avoid any dangers you might encounter.

The demo is free, however any donations would both allow me and encourage me to keep on working on this and keep on adding more content.

Although I've released a version of this demo for MacOS, I do not own an Apple computer to test it with. So if you encounter any issues, let me know!

You can enjoy this experience both with a keyboard and a gamepad and configure your binds in the game's settings.

Default keyboard binds:

[UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT] - WASD (Movement)

[ACTION] - Enter (Interact, confirm)

[ACTION_ALT] - Left Shift (Sprint, back)

[MENU] - Escape (Pause, resume)

[MENU_ALT] - Tab (Inventory)

[FULLSCREEN] - F4

[SCREENSHOT] - F12 (Saved in %AppData%/Roaming/Dream_Inducer)
